request.description:
**Endpoint**: POST /Web_store

**Description**: Returns Customer

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/store/web-store/user

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Body)**

email (String, Mandatory)

first_name (String, Mandatory)

last_name (String, optional)

password (Int32, optional)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/store/web-store/user' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "email":"prueba5",
    "first_name":"prueba7",
    "last_name":"prueba5",
    "password":"1234"
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000000,
    "business_partner_group_id": 0,
    "created": "2024-03-15T23:26:05Z",
    "updated": "2024-03-15T23:26:05.225Z",
    "organization_name": "",
    "email": "prueba5",
    "first_name": "prueba7",
    "last_name": "prueba5",
    "web_store_id": 0,
    "website_id": 0,
    "addresses": []
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- email is already registered
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Registered EMail / EMail A record already exists",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- name does not have a valid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "&Name Mandatory",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- email does not have a valid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "EMail Mandatory",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: GET /Web_store

**Description**: Returns Customer

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/store/web-store/user/me

**Method**: GET

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/store/web-store/user/me' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 100,
    "business_partner_group_id": 0,
    "created": "1999-12-09T22:15:00Z",
    "updated": "2005-10-18T11:58:59Z",
    "organization_name": "",
    "email": "",
    "first_name": "SuperUser",
    "last_name": "",
    "web_store_id": 0,
    "website_id": 0,
    "addresses": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /Web_store

**Description**: Returns Customer

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/store/web-store/user/me

**Mehtod**: POST

**Parameters (Body):**

- id (Int32,Optional)
- business_partner_group_id (Int32, Optional)
- organization_name (String, Optional)
- email (String,Mandatory)
- first_name (String, Mandatory)
- last_name (String, Optional)
- web_store_id (Int32, Optional)
- website_id (Int32, Optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/store/web-store/user/me' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU' \
--data '{
    "id":1000000,
    "business_partner_group_id":0,
    "organization_name":"Store West",
    "email":"asd",
    "first_name":"asd",
    "last_name":"asd",
    "web_store_id":0,
    "website_id":0
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000000,
    "business_partner_group_id": 0,
    "created": "2024-03-09T16:37:04Z",
    "updated": "2024-03-09T16:48:51.472Z",
    "organization_name": "",
    "email": "asd",
    "first_name": "asd",
    "last_name": "asd",
    "web_store_id": 0,
    "website_id": 0,
    "addresses": []
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- The user and email entered do not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Usuario / Email * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: GET /Web_store

**Description**: Returns Stock

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/store/web-store/stock/{sku}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

sku (int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/store/web-store/stock/12345' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "product_id": 0,
    "store_id": 0,
    "quantity": 0,
    "is_in_stock": false,
    "is_decimal_quantity": false,
    "is_show_default_notification_message": false,
    "is_use_config_minimum_quantity": false,
    "minimum_quantity": 0,
    "is_use_config_minimum_sale_quantity": false,
    "minimum_sale_quantity": 0,
    "is_use_config_maximum_sale_quantity": false,
    "maximum_sale_quantity": 0,
    "is_use_config_backorders": false,
    "backorders": 0,
    "is_use_config_notify_stock_quantity": false,
    "notify_stock_quantity": 0,
    "is_use_config_quantity_increments": false,
    "quantity_increments": 0,
    "is_use_config_enable_quantity_increments": false,
    "is_enable_quantity_increments": false,
    "is_use_config_manage_stock": false,
    "is_manage_stock": false,
    "is_decimal_divided": false,
    "stock_status_changed_auto": 0
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the sku does not correspond to any record
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Producto * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

request.description: **Endpoint**: GET /Web_store **Description**: Returns ListRenderProducts **FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/store/web-store/product/render-list/{skus} **Method**: GET **Parameters (Params)** skus (int32, Mandatory) **Application Example** ``` bash curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/store/web-store/product/render-list?skus=12345' \ --header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU' ``` **Example Answer** ``` json { "record_count": "1", "render_products": [ { "id": 1000003, "name": "prueba", "type": "", "store_id": 50006, "url": "", "product_type": "CONFIGURABLE", "price_info": { "final_price": 0, "max_price": 0, "max_regular_price": 0, "minimal_regular_price": 0, "special_price": 0, "minimal_price": 0, "regular_price": 0, "formatted_price": { "final_price": "$0.00", "max_price": "$0.00", "minimal_price": "$0.00", "max_regular_price": "$0.00", "minimal_regular_price": "$0.00", "special_price": "$0.00", "regular_price": "$0.00" }, "tax_adjustment": { "final_price": 0, "max_price": 0, "max_regular_price": 0, "minimal_regular_price": 0, "special_price": 0, "minimal_price": 0, "regular_price": 0, "weee_adjustment": "$0.00", "formatted_price": { "final_price": "$0.00", "max_price": "$0.00", "minimal_price": "$0.00", "max_regular_price": "$0.00", "minimal_regular_price": "$0.00", "special_price": "$0.00", "regular_price": "$0.00" } }, "currency_code": "USD" } } ], "next_page_token": "" } ``` **Change control** | **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

request.description:
**Endpoint**: POST /Web_store

**Description**: Returns Cart

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/store/web-store/cart/create

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Body)**

- cart_id (int32, Optional)
    
- customer_id (int32, Optional)
    
- user_id (Int32, Optional)
    
- shipping_address (JSON, Optional)
    
- billing_address (JSON, Optional)
    
- method_code (String, Optional)
    
- carrier_code (String, Optional)
    
- payment_method_code (String, Optional)
    
- products (JSON, Optional)
    
- payments (JSON, Optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/store/web-store/cart/create' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU' \
--data '{
    "cart_id":12345,
    "customer_id":102,
    "user_id":50000,
    "shipping_address":{},
    "billing_address":{},
    "method_code":"",
    "carrier_code":"",
    "payment_method_code":"",
    "products":{},
    "payments":{}
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000000,
    "grand_total": 0,
    "subtotal": 0,
    "discount_amount": 0,
    "subtotal_with_discount": 0,
    "tax_amount": 0,
    "shipping_amount": 0,
    "shipping_discount_amount": 0,
    "shipping_tax_amount": 0,
    "base_shipping_tax_amount": 0,
    "subtotal_incl_tax": 0,
    "shipping_incl_tax": 0,
    "base_currency_code": "",
    "quote_currency_code": "",
    "items_quantity": 0,
    "items": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /Web_store

**Description**: Returns Cart

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/store/web-store/cart/update

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Body)**

- cart_id (Int32, Optional)
- is_quest (Bool, Optional)
- sku (String, Mandatory)
- quantity (Int32, Optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/store/web-store/cart/update' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU' \
--data '{
    "cart_id":1000000,
    "is_guest":true,
    "sku":"12345",
    "quantity":1
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "product_id": 1000003,
    "sku": "12345",
    "quantity": 1,
    "name": "prueba",
    "price": 0,
    "product_type": "CONFIGURABLE",
    "row_total": 0,
    "row_total_with_discount": 0,
    "tax_amount": 0,
    "tax_percent": 0,
    "discount_amount": 0,
    "discount_percent": 0,
    "price_incl_tax": 0,
    "row_total_incl_tax": 0,
    "base_row_total_incl_tax": 0,
    "configurable_item_options": []
}

 ```

**Commons Erros**

- The sku entered does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Producto * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the sku does not contain a valid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "UM Almacenamiento Entrada Obligatoria",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: GET /Web_store

**Description**: Returns Cart

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/store/web-store/cart/shipping-information?cart_id=1000000' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'
 ```

**Endpoint**: GET /Web_store

**Description**: Returns CartTotals

request.description:
**Endpoint**: POST /Web_store

**Description**: Returns Empty

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/store/web-store/cart/delete

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Body)**

- cart_id (Int32, Optional)
- sku (String, Mandatory)
- product_id (Int32, Optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/store/web-store/cart/delete' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU' \
--data '{
    "cart_id":1000000,
    "sku":"12345",
    "product_id":10000002
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{}

 ```

**Commons Erros**

- The sku does not contain a valid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "UM Almacenamiento Entrada Obligatoria",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- The data entered does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Producto * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```
